TopicTitle: Kerbals at War - The very first KSP War movie

Articles.Content: Thank you for making this!

That was insane.

Ridiculously awesomely insane, to be specific.

I feel like getting a YouTube account just to subscribe.

WAHOO.

Wow.. that was just... well I will let the above comments do the talking.

But just imagine the potential of this.

I haven\'t really been going to space that much... Any Questions that aren\'t answered in the description I\'ll answer here. Enjoy!

O M G. I had NO idea I was playing this game wrong until now. Son of a !! Great amazing kerbaltastic job man.

-Ziff
That was beautiful.

These are the best weapons Ive ever seen on KSP (Dont tell Tim_Barret that though) the best I could do are these two. A Light Tank and a Mobile Rocket Platform with stabalisers or as some may call it a 'Rocket Truck'.

I would love to see aliens and space battles added at some point.

Wouldn\'t it be fun if one of the added planets added in the future had life on it?

Wouldn\'t it be fun if one of the added planets added in the future had life on it?

I\'m hoping the next world we get will have intelligent life... Now that EVAs are in place.
Now all you need to do is out some sattelites in the air and attach Yorik\'s particle cannon. Now that would be epic.

Someone needs to make a Kerbal War game.

There needs to be a kerbal series. Now.
Flip\'n awesome! :-D
Craft?
Surely the bestest Kerbal movie made since Jeb first graced our screens. Amazing job.
I\'m against armed violence in this game, even that the video is artistic, many users will play more war than building rockets, if a kerbal game with only the war will ever be.
I love rocketry and space as much as anyone else, but there\'s no denying the awesome levels of this video.

Come to think of it, a multiplayer wargame where you can put your machines together from parts would be amazing.

Harvester, will you please, pretty please find someone in squad to do something like this.

No denying the awesomeness of this video.

Please keep up the good work.

Uhhhhh wow... That was epic!

If this is just a hint of what multiplayer might be like. This will be the most awesome sandbox game since Gmod!

This. Also, I think I already left like three comments on the video about how awesome it is. xD But anyhow, here\'s another one. It\'s awesome, please make more, and also possibly just make a few videos showing the designs and how you made them. Also, the satellite (I think I saw you mention it somewhere), I want to see that thing in another video.

Someday, we shall make this game multiplayer somehow! Whether Squad does it or someone comes along with a mod. That would be epic!
Thank you for the VTOL design. Pretty badass, if I say so myself
Would you please post the craft files so we can steal all the credit upscale them and use them in 0.16?
Flabbergasted, know idea how you managed to make those vehicles, and no idea how you showed to vehicles moving at the same time. Awesome video, hope to see more, maybe with a little story as well
I think I understood why it has been made in 0.15 : in 0.16, railgun bullets seem to pass TROUGH other parts ! Also, giving the .crafts would not work since 0.16 also broke craft formats

I think I understood why it has been made in 0.15 : in 0.16, railgun bullets seem to pass TROUGH other parts ! Also, giving the .crafts would not work since 0.16 also broke craft formats

Someone had made an 0.16 Craft Updater. :3
Love the rocket engine spinning out of control at the end 8)

AAAAaaaaa!

Awesomness overflow!

I\'ve just got nerdgasm.

Multiplayer, now!
